rules_text:
Lifelink
Triggered abilities of creatures you control that would trigger only when that creature enters instead trigger whenever you gain life for the first time each turn.
notes:
!rul Effectively, this makes all trigger conditions that are exactly "When ~ enters the battlefield" into "Whenever you gain life for the first time each turn". Conditions such as "Whenever ~ enters the battlefield or attacks" or "Whenever ~ or another creature enter the battlefield" will not be affected.

Replace all instances of “When this creature enters the battlefield” among creatures you control with “Whenever you gain life for the first time each turn.”
